keyPolicies.policyDescription: Daniel Hawthorne has publicly backed Stockport's Mayor Colin Smith in his bid for bigger Police budgets.

issues.economy: Lib Dems will create a fairer society with Fair Taxes, reducing Â£700 p.a. less Tax!
issues.environment: Opposed the Labour Council's plan to install a Waste Transfer Station.

housing.content: Daniel is backing local residents against the Labour Council's Car Park scheme. Daniel, Jenny and the local Lib Dem councillors believe there are better ways to use this land.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Daniel has challenged the Labour MP to agree to a series of Public Debates with him.
